title: Xiaomi to showcase its first electric car, the SU7 EV, in India tomorrow: Report
description: Xiaomi will showcase its first electric car, the SU7, in India on July 9 as a market test. The car comes in two versions with different driving ranges and is priced competitively. The event in Bengaluru will also feature other household appliances and new product categories.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
